questions.question: A Machine Learning Specialist is using Amazon SageMaker Clarify to detect potential biases in their model. They want to ensure both the input data and model are fair. What steps can SageMaker Clarify take to assist in this? (Choose Two.)
options: Provide post-training bias analysis for model predictions
Automatically remove biased features from the dataset
Automatically optimize model hyperparameters to reduce bias
Replace unbalanced classes with synthetic data points
Detect pre-training bias in the dataset
correct_answers: Provide post-training bias analysis for model predictions
Detect pre-training bias in the dataset
questions.Practice test: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate MLA-C01
